[http://web.archive.org/web/20030204082428/http://www.bluetake.com/Products/BW318.htm Product page (via archive.org)] This device looks rather '''BroMax'''y. ==Reviews== *[[http://publish.it168.com/2002/1226/20021226100301.shtml Pictures On '''it168.com''' (CN)], dated December 26, 2002 *[http://web.archive.org/web/20040418194233/http://www.bytesector.com/data/bs-article.asp?ID=135 On '''ByteSector''' (via archive.org)], dated March 08. 2003 ==Vendor / Other links== *[http://www.nix.ru/autocatalog/wireless_lan/Bluetake_BW318_Wireless_LAN_Access_Point_802.11b_18451.html On '''nix.ru'''] (specs)
